Package index

Description

oxthema-package oxthema
Oxford Colours, Palettes, Fonts, and Themes

Colours

oxford_colours
Oxford colours based on University of Oxford's visual identity guidelines
get_oxford_colour() get_oxford_colours()
Get named Oxford colours vector

Palettes

oxford_theme_palettes() oxford_brewer_palettes()
Oxford theme palettes from visual identity guidelines
create_palette_sequential() create_palette_divergent() create_palette_qualitative() create_brewer_palette()
Create new palettes based on Oxford palettes

Fonts

oxford_fonts check_oxford_fonts()
Oxford core and additional fonts

Themes

theme_oxford()
A generic/base ggplot2::ggplot2 theme for the oxthema package
theme_oxford_forest() theme_heritage_forest() theme_contemporary_forest() theme_celebratory_forest() theme_corporate_forest() theme_innovative_forest()
Oxford theme for forestploter::forestploter package

Utilities

cmyk2rgb()
Convert CMYK to RGB
print(<palette>)
Print a palette

Supporting datasets

nut_survey_map
Example map data for showing map plotting with Oxford colours
